gudusoft.gsqlparser.nodes

Class TTriggeringClause

  • java.lang.Object
    • gudusoft.gsqlparser.nodes.TParseTreeNode
      • gudusoft.gsqlparser.nodes.TTriggeringClause
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Visitable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TCompoundDmlTriggerClause, TNonDmlTriggerClause, TSimpleDmlTriggerClause

    public class TTriggeringClause
extends TParseTreeNode
    Trigger clause including: action time: before, after, instead of event type: insert, delete, update, ddl event, database event, TDmlEventClause referencing clause: old, new ,parent There are 3 types of triggering clause: simple dml, compound dml, non-dml. subclass of this class is: TSimpleDmlTriggerClause, TCompoundDmlTriggerClause, TNonDmlTriggerClause
